content: I'd like to assemble a terminology bundle by hand because the tooling to upload R4 instances to a server is currently lacking. Tried to use sushi for this, but a codesystem isn't fitting into a Bundle instance. Am I doing something wrong? https://fshschool.org/FSHOnline/#/share/3qGsK3m

Hi @Vadim Peretokin -- we noticed that this doesn't work for ValueSets; but had not yet noticed that it doesn't work for CodeSystems. So... this is a variation on this known bug: https://github.com/FHIR/sushi/issues/971

We actually have someone working on this already, but it's been slow due to the holiday. They should be picking it up again this week.
Hi @Vadim Peretokin -- this has been fixed in SUSHI 2.2.6.
